body: The prefix for your server is `#PREFIX`.

fields.title: Utility
content: - **#PREFIXprefix** Get or set the current prefix. `OPTIONAL[prefix]`
- **#PREFIXabout** Get basic information about Null and its status.
- **#PREFIXhelp** Get info on commands or get this message. `OPTIONAL[command_name]`

fields.title: Math and Science
content: - **#PREFIXmath** Evaluate a math expression. `expression`
- **#PREFIXwolfram** Query *Wolfram | Alpha*. `query`
- **#PREFIXtex** Generate a LaTeX image from a given string. `tex`
- **#PREFIXequation** Generate a fancy image of an equation. `equation`
- **#PREFIXrand** Generate a random number between one or two specified bounds. `bounds`
- **#PREFIXshuffle** Shuffle a list of items delimited by a comma and space. `list`

fields.title: Music
content: - **#PREFIXplay** Play a song or add it to the queue if a song is playing. `name`
- **#PREFIXstop** Stop the music and empties the queue.
- **#PREFIXskip** Skip a song.
- **#PREFIXpause** Pause the current song.
- **#PREFIXresume** Resume the current song if a song is paused.
- **#PREFIXclearqueue** Empty the queue except for the current song.
- **#PREFIXqueue** Display the current queue and now playing.
- **#PREFIXloopqueue** Enable or disable queue looping.
- **#PREFIXvolume** Get or set the volume. `OPTIONAL[volume]`
- **#PREFIXshufflequeue** Shuffle the queue except for the now playing.
- **#PREFIXswap** Swap to songs in the queue. `positions`
- **#PREFIXremove** Remove a song for the queue. `position`
- **#PREFIXmove** Move a song to different position in the queue. `positions`

fields.title: Fun
content: - **#PREFIXemojify** Convert letters and numbers to emojis. `text`
- **#PREFIXnonsense** Spit out less than 200 random characters. `length`
- **#PREFIXcopypasta** Pastify some text. `text`
- **#PREFIXmeme** Get a dank meme.
- **#PREFIXcat** Get a cute cat picture.
- **#PREFIXcatfact** Get a random cat fact.
- **#PREFIXjoke** Get a random Dad Joke.
- **#PREFIXurban** Search the *Urban Dictionary*.
- **#PREFIXreddit** Get a hot post for a specified subreddit. `subreddit`
- **#PREFIXgenmeme** Generate a meme. `"format" OPTIONAL["toptext" "bottomtext"]`
- **#PREFIXmotivate** Generate a motivation quote.

fields.title: Money
content: - **#PREFIXslots** Play the slot machine. If no bet is given, it's free. `OPTIONAL[bet]`
- **#PREFIXgive** Give someone money. `mention amount`
- **#PREFIXwork** Work a random job for some quick cash. __Timer: Every 30 minutes.__
- **#PREFIXsteal** Steal from someone. `mention amount` __Timer: Every 45 minutes.__
- **#PREFIXbalance** See your or someone else's balance. `OPTIONAL[name]`
- **#PREFIXdailies** Receive some daily cash. __Timer: Daily__

fields.title: Games
content: - **#PREFIXtrivia** Play a trivia guessing game.
- **#PREFIXrps** Play rock, paper, scissors.
- **#PREFIXcoinflip** Flip a coin.
- **#PREFIXdiceroll** Roll a six sided die.
- **#PREFIXdrawcard** Draw a random playing card.

fields.title: Filters
content: - **#PREFIXaddfilter** Add a chat filter for a term. `term`
- **#PREFIXremovefilter** Remove a chat filter for a term. `term`
- **#PREFIXshowfilters** Display all the servers current filters.
